title: Change in kinetic energy from force and distance

content.description: A 2 kg block is initially at rest on a horizontal frictionless table. A force of 15 N is then exerted on the block at an angle of 37 degrees to the horizontal, as shown below.
content.question: The change in the kinetic energy of the block after moving a distance of 3 m is most nearly

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
